issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

I don't think this caused any test failures. This was seen using VPCMIDO network mode.
fields.summary: Object storage hostname parsing error logged

comments.body: I should have noted that the error log messages were on the cloud controller, which did not have an object storage service registered.
Confirmed that I see the same error message on the CLC node on 4.3.0.1. Any idea the root cause?
Not seeing this error logged using curl -H  "Host:" http://localhost:8773/services/Invalid
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
